title: LF Odyssey Team To Complete Onslaught Missions
body:
If anyone wants a team to complete the Onslaught missions than add me or comment below. Would prefer if you have already beatean the Onslaught level.

I currently have to complete these missions:
- Clear Onslaught with all 5 people playing as either Ziggs or Sona
- Clear Onslaught as a team without Sona or Ziggs, and only 1 Jinx
- Clear Onslaught with each person having 3 or fewer Augments equipped
- Clear Onslaught with each person having 2 or fewer Augments equipped

Add me or comment below if interested.

replies.body: I'm also looking for a team with similar missions - feel free to add me :)
